verses.name: Numbers 28:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Numbers 28:2
verses.text: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them, My offering, and my bread for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet savour unto me, shall ye observe to offer unto me in their due season.

verses.name: Numbers 28:3
verses.text: And thou shalt say unto them, This is the offering made by fire which ye shall offer unto the Lord; two lambs of the first year without spot day by day, for a continual burnt offering.

verses.name: Numbers 28:4
verses.text: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at even;
